headline: Mizuho Reaffirms Buy Rating on Evergy Amid Favorable Kansas Regulatory Outlook
summary: Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG) ranks among the top stocks for an early retirement portfolio. On June 10, Mizuho Securities reiterated its Outperform rating and $70 price target for Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ:EVRG), maintaining its optimistic outlook. The backing follows recent events in a rate case involving Evergy subsidiary Kansas Central. The testimony of the Kansas Corporation Commission […]
